thread.title: Corporate Apartment Specialists, Inc. (CAS) creates General Manager Position

author: cnbc.com
title: Corporate Apartment Specialists, Inc. (CAS) creates General Manager Position
text:
WASHINGTON, March 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Corporate Apartment Specialists, Inc., (CAS) is pleased to announce the promotion of Shannon McVicker to General Manager. McVicker joined CAS in 2004 and was responsible for all operational tasks related to the customer experience including quality control, customer service and product delivery. During her tenure, McVicker has been relentless in her pursuit of excellence, innovation and process improvement. She has worked tirelessly to understand, meet, and exceed CAS' customers' expectations. In her new position, McVicker's role expands to encompass sales including on-line booking management.
"Shannon is a proven leader and innovator. She has had her hand in every aspect of our business and nothing escapes her eye toward improvement," said Tania Odabashian. Shannon McVicker's main goal in her new role is to strategically expand and manage CAS' market share with a steady eye on profitability and operational productivity.
CAS, founded in December, 1995, is a leading provider of short-term furnished apartments in the Washington, DC Metropolitan area. 2017 revenues were 5.5 million dollars. CAS' customers consist primarily of consulting, government and other commercial clientele coming to the Washington, DC area on short-term assignment. CAS also serves many individuals and homeowners who are in need of short-term furnished housing for various reasons. Corporate Apartment Specialists, Inc. specializes in temporary housing with leases of one to twelve months; all apartments are fully furnished with housewares, utilities, telephone, cable, and high-speed internet included. CAS has serviced apartments in approximately thirty locations throughout the Washington, DC Metropolitan Area. Studios start at $2,790, one bedrooms at $3,090 and two bedrooms at $3,690. For further information, call Ned Scharpf at (703) 979-2830 or visit CAS' website at www.corporateapartments.com .
